-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this new twist on an old Mark Twain yarn, NASA scientist Dennis Dugan and his 
robot clone are whisked back in time to the days of King Arthur (Kenneth More). 
After performing several acts of "sorcery" with the state-of-the-art 
paraphernalia at his disposal, Dugan incurs the wrath of in-house magician 
Merlin (Ron Moody). Jim Dale costars as the most hyperkinetic Sir Mordred that 
you&#039;re ever likely too see. Previous versions of Twain&#039;s Connecticut Yankee in 
King Arthur&#039;s Court were filmed in 1921, 1931 and 1948; Spaceman in King 
Arthur&#039;s Court would be followed by an early-1990s TV adaptation of Connecticut 
Yankee starring The Cosby Show&#039;s Keshia Knight Pulliam, and by Disney&#039;s 1995 
theatrical feature, A Kid in King Arthur&#039;s Court. (allmovie)
